import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderPage from "./header"; import FooterPage from "./footer"; // import HomePage from "./home"; import SidebarPage from "./sidebar"; import firebase from '../config'; import renderHTML from 'react-render-html'; class ProductListView extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { productList: [], loading: false, count: 1, activePage: "1", countPage: "", status: '' }; } componentDidMount() { const {productID}=this.props.match.params; console.log(productID); this.setState({ loading: true }); var ref = firebase.database().ref(`products/${productID}`); ref.on('value', snapshot => { var products = snapshot.val(); console.log(products); this.setState({ productName: products.productName, category: products.category, subCategory: products.subCategory, gstValue: products.gstValue, pincode: products.pincode, price: products.price, offerPrice: products.offerPrice, sellingPrice: products.sellingPrice, quantityStock: products.quantityStock, alertQuantity: products.alertQuantity, packagingCost:products.packagingCost, downloadURLs: products.uploadImage, avatarURL:products.frontImage, content: products.description, loading: false }); }); } render() { return (

Price {this.state.price}

Packaging Cost {this.state.packagingCost}

{this.state.downloadURLs && this.state.downloadURLs.map((downloadURL, i) => { return
})}

); } } export default ProductListView;
